A

AbstractLibraryItem - Class in librarySE.core
Abstract base implementation of LibraryItem that provides: A generated unique UUID identifier for each item instance. Common price handling with validation. Thread-safe implementations of borrowing and returning operations. A template-method based design that delegates copy-specific logic to subclasses via AbstractLibraryItem.isAvailableInternal(), AbstractLibraryItem.doBorrow(), and AbstractLibraryItem.doReturn().
activity() - Method in class librarySE.managers.reports.ReportManager
Provides access to activity-based reports.
ActivityReportService - Class in librarySE.managers.reports
Service class that provides analytical reporting features for library activity.
ActivityReportService(List<BorrowRecord>) - Constructor for class librarySE.managers.reports.ActivityReportService
Creates a new ActivityReportService with a given list of borrow records.
addFine(BigDecimal) - Method in class librarySE.managers.User
Adds a new fine amount to the user's total.
addItem(LibraryItem, Admin) - Method in class librarySE.managers.ItemManager
Adds a new LibraryItem to the system.
addUser(User) - Method in class librarySE.managers.UserManager
Registers a new user and persists the updated user list.
Admin - Class in librarySE.managers
Represents the single administrative account within the library system.
